channel.title: How come i cant do this ::banip (username)?
channel.description:
On my server it hellzend and i cant do ::banip (there name)
I need a code or help how to make this happen and with characters player rights 2 so my admins can type ::banip
please post a code and explain were to place. I really need this so i can easly ban ppl. Thanx For Your Help !

item.title: How come i cant do this ::banip (username)?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

client.java:9735: ')' expected if(command.startsWith("banip") && (playerRights >= 2) { ^ client.java:9743: ')' expected System.out.println("Admin "+playerName+" is IP banning "+victim"!"); ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

i get this and were do i add this

[code]public void appendToBannedIP (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning ip");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How come i cant do this ::banip (username)?

item.title: How come i cant do this ::banip (username)?
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

Because i never needed to add a banip command.

if(command.startsWith("banip") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); } System.out.println("Admin "+playerName+" is IP banning "+victim); sendMessage(""+victim+" successfully ip banned!"); }

[code]public void appendToBannedIP (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning ip");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic
